name: Bike Madness
description:
Controls:

- WASD to move camera and pan it with the mouse middle button

- Mouse middle button: zoom the camera

-Press Spacebar + mouse left click to build a Bike Station

Tutorial:

Your task is to put bike stations near by the spots that people want to reach, and near by them (every bike station is connected to each other). If you take too long they gonna get angry with the bike management and they gonna get a taxi, so city pollution gonna increase. You can use a van to move unused bikes between stations in order to guarantee that the demand is satisfied. 

Bikes, Bike stations and vans cost money. But don't worry, each user of your bike system have to pay!

Game description:

You will play in a contemporany polluted city in which people will come out from Apartment Buildings wanting to go to an Interest Point Building in the city through the bikes network.

Your job will be to place bike stations nearby apartments and nearby Interest Points so users can go from point to point with a bike, and finally, your objective is to decrease the pollution as much as you can, so everybody is healthy and happy with your bike network.

Be careful, because if users have to wait too much they will decide to not use bikes, so the pollution will increase, and if it reaches the top in the bar, the city will be polluted enough so to not to let people live in there, you will lose!

You can build stations and buy bikes for each. Each user will give you money for the use of the network, and you can also use a truck to move bikes from station to station (by interacting with the stations' UI).
